pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion.
pre_caption: The video begins with a view of a street sign reading 'Kabukicho Sakura-dori St.' hanging above the street, surrounded by tall buildings with various signs and advertisements. The camera then moves downward, revealing more of the street below, including a few pedestrians walking on the sidewalk and some construction cones placed on the road. As the camera continues to move forward, more details of the street become visible, such as additional signs, storefronts, and more pedestrians.
